A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible entry into the series. Insulting to fans of the original trilogies. Just because it takes Star Wars to places we haven't seen before or does things differently than people expect\, doesn't automatically make for a good film. Most if not all new characters in this movie were boring and one dimensional\, any potential storylines of interest established in the TFA were all wasted in this travesty.
